name: distributed-dungeon
description: Distributed RPG platform with microservices architecture

scripts.install:all: npm run install:dungeon-master && npm run install:dungeon && npm run install:monster && npm run install:player && npm run install:communication && npm run install:rules-engine
scripts.test: npm run test:dungeon-master && npm run test:dungeon && npm run test:monster && npm run test:player && npm run test:communication && npm run test:rules-engine
scripts.lint: npm run lint:dungeon-master && npm run lint:dungeon && npm run lint:monster && npm run lint:player && npm run lint:communication && npm run lint:rules-engine
scripts.db:migrate: docker-compose exec database psql -U postgres -d dungeon_db -f /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/001_initial_schema.sql
scripts.db:seed: docker-compose exec database psql -U postgres -d dungeon_db -f /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/seeds/001_core_data.sql
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.backup:db: docker-compose exec database pg_dump -U postgres -d dungeon_db > backups/backup-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).sql
scripts.health: curl -f http://localhost:3001/health && curl -f http://localhost:3002/health && curl -f http://localhost:3003/health && curl -f http://localhost:3004/health && curl -f http://localhost:3005/health && curl -f http://localhost:3006/health

author: Distributed Dungeon Team
